ygData.subject: Re: New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, I think I bumped into him once before.  Many many levels back I decided to poke around and visit all the buildings in Highpass.  One of the inns was
ygData.messageBody:
"Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" wrote:

> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Apologize beforehand for adding to the increasing number of off topic posts
> on this list but I had an encounter last night with a NPC in Highpass hold
> that I had never seen or heard of before. I was camping the Mucktail site
> with a level 29 cleric. While we were waiting, we start to see messages
> scroll through "Cytodl Krish begins to cast a spell". Next thing we know we
> get attacked by a high level DE necro. He conned red to me (19 bard) and
> blue to the 29 cleric. Because we were totally caught by surprise, we both
> had to make a run for the Keep zone. We fully recharged and went out
> looking for him. I was singing invis and had elemental and purifying
> ryhthms ready to weave. We finally found the necro wandering around the
> zone, with a bunch of corpses in his wake. We attacked at the cleric tried
> rooting him several times. He kept resisting and the cleric was OOM (oops, I
> used an acronym). We had to run to the border again. We recharged and
> tracked him down once again. The second time, the cleric just kept smiting
> him and we eventually killed him. All told did over 800 damage to him. He
> didn't drop any loot which was a disappointment. When we killed him, the
> factions affected, which all got worse, were The Dead, King and Queen of
> some wierd name, Keepers of the Art, and Eldritch Collective. After the
> fight, we asked around if anyone had ever seen/heard of this NPC before. No
> one in the zone had heard of him. Was wondering if anyone on this list
> could shed some light on his background? Also wanted to warn everyone in
> case they ran into him and they were less level 30 they should be prepared
> to run.

Hmm, I think I bumped into him once before. Many many levels back I decided
to poke around and visit all the buildings in Highpass. One of the inns was
particularly large, and I was busily opening doors and peeking inside, when all of
a sudden I get the dreaded "Wood elves like you have no place in our realm!"
message and an awfully scary DE starts hitting me. (through the wall, btw. :) )
I almost made it to the Highkeep zone, but I took a wrong turn and he took me
down - I imagine someone did something similar, and this DE started wandering
around, killing all in his path.

-Lohengrin Windstrider
-bard of Rallos Zek, looking forward to testing the fear song on his friends. :)
